name: Robot Boxing: Modern Fight
description:
Robot Boxing: Modern Fight is grand collision of heavy giant fighting machines. Time to break some bones with best robot action. Show off your fighting skills like never before. Be careful the Opponents are fast and can hurt you, defend your self and don't stop attacking. Fight with all the enemy Robots and be a real warrior.

Features:

* Ultimate Robot Fight Game
* Real Iron Robot Fight
* Realistic Fighting Animations
* Amazing and Smooth Gameplay
* Steel Robot Opponents
